Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix choppy animations by switching to time-based 60fps updates

Replace the discrete-step delay\(\) animation in animateProgress\(\) with
time-based animation using System.nanoTime\(\) and 16ms frame intervals.
The old approach used fixed steps \(e.g. 24 steps over 800ms = ~30fps\)
which caused visible choppiness, especially during the board entry
drop-in animation. Now all 13+ animations run at smooth ~60fps.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Fix 14 bugs found in full codebase audit \(75 files reviewed\)
